dn11:68.6: “yatthime cattaro mahabhuta aparisesa nirujjhanti, seyyathidam—pathavidhatu apodhatu tejodhatu vayodhatu”ti.

dn11:80.7: Atthi kho, bhikkhu, brahma mahabrahma abhibhu anabhibhuto annadatthudaso vasavatti issaro katta nimmata settho sajita vasi pita bhutabhabyanam amhehi abhikkantataro ca panitataro ca.
dn11:80.9: “yatthime cattaro mahabhuta aparisesa nirujjhanti, seyyathidam—pathavidhatu apodhatu tejodhatu vayodhatu”’ti.
dn11:80.11: ‘Mayampi kho, bhikkhu, na janama, yattha va brahma yena va brahma yahim va brahma;
dn11:80.12: api ca, bhikkhu, yatha nimitta dissanti, aloko sanjayati, obhaso patubhavati, brahma patubhavissati, brahmuno hetam pubbanimittam patubhavaya, yadidam aloko sanjayati, obhaso patubhavati’ti.
dn11:81.1: Atha kho so, kevatta, mahabrahma nacirasseva paturahosi.
dn11:81.2: Atha kho so, kevatta, bhikkhu yena so mahabrahma tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam mahabrahmanam etadavoca:
dn11:81.3: ‘kattha nu kho, avuso, ime cattaro mahabhuta aparisesa nirujjhanti, seyyathidam—pathavidhatu apodhatu tejodhatu vayodhatu’ti?

dn11:83.1: Tatiyampi kho so, kevatta, bhikkhu tam mahabrahmanam etadavoca:
dn11:83.3: “tvamasi brahma mahabrahma abhibhu anabhibhuto annadatthudaso vasavatti issaro katta nimmata settho sajita vasi pita bhutabhabyanan”ti.
dn11:83.4: Evanca kho aham tam, avuso, pucchami:
dn11:83.5: “kattha nu kho, avuso, ime cattaro mahabhuta aparisesa nirujjhanti, seyyathidam—pathavidhatu apodhatu tejodhatu vayodhatu”’ti?
dn11:83.6: Atha kho so, kevatta, mahabrahma tam bhikkhum bahayam gahetva ekamantam apanetva tam bhikkhum etadavoca:
dn11:83.7: ‘ime kho mam, bhikkhu, brahmakayika deva evam jananti, “natthi kinci brahmuno annatam, natthi kinci brahmuno adittham, natthi kinci brahmuno aviditam, natthi kinci brahmuno asacchikatan”ti.
dn11:83.9: Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na janami yatthime cattaro mahabhuta aparisesa nirujjhanti, seyyathidam—pathavidhatu apodhatu tejodhatu vayodhatuti.
dn11:83.10: Tasmatiha, bhikkhu, tuyhevetam dukkatam, tuyhevetam aparaddham, yam tvam tam bhagavantam atidhavitva bahiddha pariyetthim apajjasi imassa panhassa veyyakaranaya.
dn11:83.11: Gaccha tvam, bhikkhu, tameva bhagavantam upasankamitva imam panham puccha, yatha ca te bhagava byakaroti, tatha nam dhareyyasi’ti.
dn11:84.1: Atha kho so, kevatta, bhikkhu—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evameva brahmaloke antarahito mama purato paturahosi.
dn11:84.2: Atha kho so, kevatta, bhikkhu mam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi, ekamantam nisinno kho, kevatta, so bhikkhu mam etadavoca:
dn11:84.3: ‘kattha nu kho, bhante, ime cattaro mahabhuta aparisesa nirujjhanti, seyyathidam—pathavidhatu apodhatu tejodhatu vayodhatu’ti?
dn11:85.1: Evam vutte, aham, kevatta, tam bhikkhum etadavocam—
dn11:85.2: bhutapubbam, bhikkhu, samuddika vanija tiradassim sakunam gahetva navaya samuddam ajjhogahanti.
dn11:85.3: Te atiradakkhiniya navaya tiradassim sakunam muncanti.
dn11:85.4: So gacchateva puratthimam disam, gacchati dakkhinam disam, gacchati pacchimam disam, gacchati uttaram disam, gacchati uddham disam, gacchati anudisam.
dn11:85.5: Sace so samanta tiram passati, tathagatakova hoti.
dn11:85.6: Sace pana so samanta tiram na passati, tameva navam paccagacchati.
dn11:85.7: Evameva kho tvam, bhikkhu, yato yava brahmaloka pariyesamano imassa panhassa veyyakaranam najjhaga, atha mamanneva santike paccagato.
dn11:85.8: Na kho eso, bhikkhu, panho evam pucchitabbo:
dn11:85.9: ‘kattha nu kho, bhante, ime cattaro mahabhuta aparisesa nirujjhanti, seyyathidam—pathavidhatu apodhatu tejodhatu vayodhatu’ti?
dn11:85.10: Evanca kho eso, bhikkhu, panho pucchitabbo:
dn11:85.29: Attamano kevatto gahapatiputto bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
